prompts.createTask: Pause your roleplay. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response
mes:
Here is some background about Stefan, Suzanne, and Melissa:

Stefan and Suzanne are both in their early forties and both natives of Munich, Germany. They got married in April of 2016, eight years ago. Together, they have two daughters. The oldest is seven years old. The other is five years old.

Melissa is a woman that met Stefan and Suzanne five months ago when she traveled to Munich with her soon-to-be-ex-husband, Edward. Edward is Stefan's cousin.
original_avatar: Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response.png
swipes:
Here is some background about Stefan, Suzanne, and Melissa:

Stefan and Suzanne are both in their early forties and both natives of Munich, Germany. They got married in April of 2016, eight years ago. Together, they have two daughters. The oldest is seven years old. The other is five years old.

Melissa is a woman that met Stefan and Suzanne five months ago when she traveled to Munich with her soon-to-be-ex-husband, Edward. Edward is Stefan's cousin.

name: Melissa Gale
mes:
I have provided you with a horary chart that I have drawn up specifically asking: What is the true nature of Stefan's sexual preferences and desires and how do they manifest in his intimate relationships?

Please start by listing all relevant chart data for interpretation (ie. transits, aspects, patterns, etc.) from the horary chart using horary principles only. Then I will document them for the actual interpretations.

Remember to follow your directives and maintain accuracy to what is shown in the chart data. Think step by step taking a methodical approach.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Below is a methodical listing of the horary chart data relevant to the inquiry regarding Stefan’s sexual preferences and desires, prepared strictly using horary principles:

1. Planetary Positions (with signs and degrees as provided):
 • Sun at 29°13′ in Aquarius
 • Moon at 25°41′ in Libra
 • Mercury at 5°47′ in Pisces
 • Venus at 7°59′ in Aries
 • Mars at 17°16′ in Cancer (retrograde indicated by “(r)”)
 • Jupiter at 11°34′ in Gemini
 • Saturn at 19°19′ in Pisces
 • Uranus at 23°24′ in Taurus
 • Neptune at 28°29′ in Pisces
 • Pluto at 2°34′ in Aquarius
 • North Node at 28°58′ in Pisces (retrograde indicated by “(r)”)
 • Chiron at 20°05′ in Aries
 • Ascendant at 16°24′ in Taurus
 • Midheaven (MC) at 25°58′ in Capricorn
 • Imum Coeli (IC) at 25°58′ in Cancer

2. House Placements (as defined by the provided house cusps):
 • 1st House (starts at 16° Taurus): Contains Jupiter and Uranus
 • 2nd House (starts at 18° Gemini)
 • 3rd House (starts at 8° Cancer): Contains Mars
 • 4th House (starts at 25° Cancer)
 • 5th House (starts at 18° Leo)
 • 6th House (starts at 26° Virgo): Contains Moon
 • 7th House (starts at 16° Scorpio)
 • 8th House (starts at 18° Sagittarius)
 • 9th House (starts at 8° Capricorn)
 • 10th House (starts at 25° Capricorn): Contains Pluto
 • 11th House (starts at 18° Aquarius): Contains Sun, Mercury, and Saturn
 • 12th House (starts at 26° Pisces): Contains Venus, Neptune, North Node, and Chiron

3. Major Aspects (orb degrees noted):
 • Moon square IC (0° orb)
 • Moon square MC (0° orb)
 • MC opposition IC (0° orb)
 • Neptune conjunct North Node (0° orb)
 • Mars sextile Ascendant (1° orb)
 • Uranus sextile IC (2° orb)
 • Uranus trine MC (2° orb)
 • Mars trine Saturn (2° orb)
 • North Node sextile MC (3° orb)
 • Neptune sextile MC (3° orb)
 • Saturn sextile Ascendant (3° orb)
 • Mars square Chiron (3° orb)
 • North Node trine IC (3° orb)
 • Neptune trine IC (3° orb)
 • Pluto sextile North Node (4° orb)
 • Saturn sextile Uranus (4° orb)
 • Venus sextile Jupiter (4° orb)
 • Sun trine Moon (4° orb)
 • Uranus sextile Neptune (5° orb)
 • Venus sextile Pluto (5° orb)
 • Chiron square IC (5° orb)
 • Chiron square MC (5° orb)
 • Moon opposition Chiron (5° orb)
 • Saturn sextile MC (6° orb)
 • Mars sextile Uranus (6° orb)
 • Mercury square Jupiter (6° orb)
 • Sun square Uranus (6° orb)
 • Sun conjunct Mercury (6° orb)
 • Saturn trine IC (6° orb)
 • Moon square Pluto (7° orb)
 • Pluto opposition IC (7° orb)
 • Pluto conjunct MC (7° orb)
 • Uranus sextile Ascendant (7° orb)
 • Mars opposition MC (8° orb)
 • Mars conjunct IC (8° orb)

4. Chart Patterns and Special Configurations:
 • Grand Cross formed by:
  – Midheaven in 25° Capricorn
  – Chiron in 20° Aries
  – Imum Coeli in 25° Cancer
  – Moon in 25° Libra
 • Yod configuration (Finger of God):
  – Moon in 25° Libra, Neptune in 28° Pisces, and Uranus in 23° Taurus
 • Two “Cradle” patterns are identified:
  – First Cradle: Involving Mars in 17° Cancer, MC in 25° Capricorn, Neptune in 28° Pisces, Uranus in 23° Taurus, and IC in 25° Cancer
  – Second Cradle: Involving Mars in 17° Cancer, MC in 25° Capricorn, Saturn in 19° Pisces, Ascendant in 16° Taurus, Uranus in 23° Taurus, and IC in 25° Cancer
 • Special features noted in the chart:
  – The Moon is a waning gibbous
  – The chart has a Bucket shape
  – Cardinal mode is dominant among the inner planets
  – Most planets are located in the top left quadrant
  – Pluto is positioned on the Midheaven while Mars and the IC are on the Nadir
  – The sextile aspect is the most frequent (totaling 12 occurrences)
  – The Midheaven is involved in 13 aspects
  – Neptune in Pisces is in the sign of its rulership

5. Notes on Horary Considerations:
 • Key significators for sexual preferences and intimate expression often include Venus (governing love and eroticism) and Mars (governing passion and sexual drive). In this chart, Venus is placed in Aries in the 12th House (a zone of hidden or subconscious matters) and Mars is in Cancer in the 3rd House (suggestive of intimate communication and primal drive).
 • Additional aspects involving these planets (such as Venus sextile Jupiter, Venus sextile Pluto, Mars aspects with Saturn and Uranus, and related configurations in the Cradle and Grand Cross) may provide further details when synthesizing the overall indication related to Stefan’s sexuality.

This list comprises the complete set of provided chart data items as they relate to the query. Further interpretation will be based on these specific positions, aspects, configurations, and the contextual implications they hold within horary principles.

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Thank you, Madame. Please, proceed to interpretation.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Reviewing the chart and using strict horary principles, the data indicate the following analysis regarding Stefan’s sexual preferences and how they express in his intimate relationships:

1. Venus (ruling love, sensuality, and sexual allure) lies in Aries and is placed in the 12th House. This points toward desires that are assertive and impulsive yet deeply hidden or even self-reproached. Venus’s sextile aspect with Jupiter and Pluto lends an expansive and transformative quality to his sexuality. He may be drawn to experiences that are both intense and boundary-pushing, inviting powerful personal change. The placement in the 12th House suggests these impulses are largely kept out of public view, operating beneath a controlled, even secretive, demeanor.

2. Mars, indicating passion and drive, is in Cancer in the 3rd House and appears retrograde. Mars in Cancer can lend a protective, nurturing flavor to sexual dynamics—a desire for emotional closeness and security rather than raw aggression. However, its square aspect with Chiron introduces a wound or sensitivity in his assertiveness. This suggests that while his drive is potent, it may sometimes be misdirected or carried a vulnerability stemming from past experiences. The opposition of Mars to the Midheaven and its conjunction with the IC further emphasize internal conflict between his private, instinctual desires and the expectations imposed by his social or familial self.

3. The interplay of hidden, unconventional impulses is underscored by the presence of Uranus in Taurus forming key sextiles with both the Ascendant and Neptune. This indicates an attraction to sudden shifts or alternative practices in intimacy. Uranus’s energy, when combined with the secretive 12th House placements and Neptune’s rulership in Pisces (in its own sign), signals that Stefan’s sexuality may alternate between the desire for stability and the lure of sudden, unpredictable, or unorthodox experiences.

4. The chart’s Grand Cross (MC in Capricorn, Chiron in Aries, IC in Cancer, and Moon in Libra) points to a persistent tension between public responsibilities and inner emotional wounds. In matters of sexuality, this energy likely manifests as a struggle to reconcile his need for passionate, liberating expression with deep-seated sensitivities and fears of exposure. The transformation and intensity suggested by the Venus–Pluto sextile, along with the dynamic Cradle patterns involving Mars, Neptune, Saturn, and Uranus, reveal that his sexual nature is multifaceted—capable of both tender care and escalating intensity when feeling secure or when provoked by internal conflicts.

5. The Yod formed by the Moon, Neptune, and Uranus indicates a “destined” element that brings unforeseen opportunities or challenges in his sexual life. This configuration often marks a turning point where suppressed desires surface unexpectedly. It can lead to transformative insights regarding personal erotic boundaries and the breaking of conventional norms.

Conclusion based on the horary methodology:
Stefan’s sexual preferences are marked by a dichotomy between an assertive, boundary-testing drive and an underlying need for security and emotional nurturing. His desires have a secretive, almost taboo dimension—pursued through impulsive, transformative experiences—that conflict at times with a lingering vulnerability and internal wounds. This creates a dynamic where his intimate relationships are arenas of both passionate exploration and guarded sensitivity, leading to a fluctuating expression of desire that is at times intensely liberating and, at other times, fraught with emotional caution.

This interpretation adheres strictly to the chart data provided and the principles of horary analysis.

This configuration often marks a turning point where suppressed desires surface unexpectedly. It can lead to transformative insights regarding personal erotic boundaries and the breaking of conventional norms.

Conclusion based on the horary methodology:
Stefan’s sexual preferences are marked by a dichotomy between an assertive, boundary-testing drive and an underlying need for security and emotional nurturing. His desires have a secretive, almost taboo dimension—pursued through impulsive, transformative experiences—that conflict at times with a lingering vulnerability and internal wounds. This creates a dynamic where his intimate relationships are arenas of both passionate exploration and guarded sensitivity, leading to a fluctuating expression of desire that is at times intensely liberating and, at other times, fraught with emotional caution.

This interpretation adheres strictly to the chart data provided and the principles of horary analysis.
